text: Tricia (24 January 1957 â€“ 6 July 2022) was an Asian elephant. She lived at the Perth Zoo in Perth, Western Australia. She lived to be one of the oldest Asian elephants in the world. Tricia was born in Saigon. Tricia died on 6 July 2022 at the Perth Zoo at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Individual elephants
title: Tricia (elephant)
